projects.title: Tabela - a management system for Restaurants
projects.description: Tabela is a comprehensive management system designed specifically for restaurants. It streamlines operations, from table reservations to order management, helping restaurant owners and staff provide better service and increase efficiency.

projects.title: FinTrack - Personal Finance Dashboard
projects.description: FinTrack is a user-friendly personal finance dashboard that helps individuals track their expenses, set budgets, and achieve financial goals. With intuitive visualizations and AI-powered insights, users can make informed decisions about their money.

projects.title: HealthHub - Patient Management App
projects.description: HealthHub is a comprehensive patient management app that allows healthcare providers to streamline their workflows, manage patient records, and improve communication with patients. The app includes features such as appointment scheduling, secure messaging, and medication reminders.

projects.title: EduConnect - Online Learning Platform
projects.description: EduConnect is an innovative online learning platform that connects students with expert tutors across various subjects. The platform features interactive video lessons, real-time collaboration tools, and adaptive learning algorithms to personalize the educational experience for each student.

projects.title: CryptoVerse - Web3 Exploration Game
projects.description: CryptoVerse is an immersive Web3 exploration game that introduces players to the world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. Through stunning 3D environments and interactive challenges, players learn about decentralized finance, NFTs, and the potential of Web3 technologies.
